com.ibm.async_util.locks

Interface AsyncLock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FairAsyncLock

    public interface AsyncLock
    An asynchronously acquirable mutual exclusion lock.

    Implementations will specify whether their lock acquisition is fair or not; this interface does not define this requirement.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AsyncLock.LockToken
      A lock token indicating that the associated lock has been exclusively acquired.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletionStage<AsyncLock.LockToken> acquireLock()
      Exclusively acquire this lock.
      Optional<AsyncLock.LockToken> tryLock()
      Attempt to immediately acquire the lock, returning a populated Optional if the lock is not currently held.

    • Method Detail

      • acquireLock

        CompletionStage<AsyncLock.LockToken> acquireLock()
        Exclusively acquire this lock. If the lock is not currently held, the returned future will be immediately complete. Otherwise, the returned future will complete when the lock is exclusively acquired by this caller.

        The AsyncLock.LockToken held by the returned future is used to release the lock after it has been acquired and the lock-protected action has completed.

      • tryLock

        Optional<AsyncLock.LockToken> tryLock()
        Attempt to immediately acquire the lock, returning a populated Optional if the lock is not currently held.
        Returns:
        An Optional holding a AsyncLock.LockToken if the lock is not held; otherwise an empty Optional
